item.description:
One part of you wants one thing, but another part wants something else.

  • Do you feel an inner “tug of war” over some things, like, “I wish –x-, but I also want –y-"?
    (I want to be slimmer but I also want to eat what I want. Sounds familiar?)
  • Do you hear yourself saying, “I can’t.” or “I wish I had the willpower or discipline to do that.”?
  • Do you feel stuck in some part of your life you wish you could get on with?

These are often signs of having an inner conflict or a limiting belief around what you want.

Are you ready to end the agonizing caused by what seems like an inner battle, & to more easily allow what you want?

Ann & Mark Ide, New Possibilities Life Coaches & BostonLOA members, will show you:

  • How to reach a satisfying & comfortable resolution to your inner conflicts.
  • How to more easily & spontaneously act in ways that fit with who you want to be as a person, honoring all parts of yourself, without any need for will power or discipline, but with ease & flow.
  • How to open up new possibilities for yourself in something you’re currently feeling emotionally drained by.

Let your inner conflicts be your inner allies
when you use your inner wisdom the right way!

******************************************************

About Ann & Mark Ide

www.NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com

Ann is a certified master practitioner in Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) & Hypnotherapy, & a certified NLP Life Coach. She coaches people to move beyond struggles & mere survival, to thrive in harmony, happiness & success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes & personal change interventions, clients become emotionally & spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness & well-being they want. 

Mark has been a successful business consultant for over 20 years, using his skills to bring greater harmony, happiness & success to the workplace. He is a certified master professional leadership & management coach.

Ann & Mark also co-lead the Metro West Law of Attraction Meetup.

******************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 
We provide handouts & have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

******************************************************
For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft : 
(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/
(2) Log in 
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

item.name: Get Unstuck! Get in the Flow!
